verses.verse: The YY <WH3068> reigneth <WH4427> <WH8804>; let the earth <WH776> rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>; let the multitude <WH7227> of isles <WH339> be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> thereof.
Clouds <WH6051> and darkness <WH6205> are round about <WH5439> him: righteousness <WH6664> and judgment <WH4941> are the habitation <WH4349> of his throne <WH3678>.
A fire <WH784> goeth <WH3212> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him, and burneth up <WH3857> <WH8762> his enemies <WH6862> round about <WH5439>.
His lightnings <WH1300> enlightened <WH215> <WH8689> the world <WH8398>: the earth <WH776> saw <WH7200> <WH8804>, and trembled <WH2342> <WH8799>.
The hills <WH2022> melted <WH4549> <WH8738> like wax <WH1749> at the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>, at the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH113> of the whole earth <WH776>.
The heavens <WH8064> declare <WH5046> <WH8689> his righteousness <WH6664>, and all the people <WH5971> see <WH7200> <WH8804> his glory <WH3519>.

Confounded <WH954> <WH8799> be all they that serve <WH5647> <WH8802> graven images <WH6459>, that boast <WH1984> <WH8693> themselves of idols <WH457>: worship <WH7812> <WH8690> him, all ye 'elohim <WH430>.
TZiyon <WH6726> heard <WH8085> <WH8804>, and was glad <WH8055> <WH8799>; and the daughters <WH1323> of Y'hudah <WH3063> rejoiced <WH1523> <WH8799> because of thy judgments <WH4941>, O YY <WH3068>.
For thou, YY <WH3068>, art high above <WH5945> all the earth <WH776>: thou art exalted <WH5927> <WH8738> far above <WH3966> all 'elohim <WH430>.

Ye that love <WH157> <WH8802> the YY <WH3068>, hate <WH8130> <WH8798> evil <WH7451>: he preserveth <WH8104> <WH8802> the souls <WH5315> of his saints <WH2623>; he delivereth <WH5337> <WH8686> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563>.
Light <WH216> is sown <WH2232> <WH8803> for the righteous <WH6662>, and gladness <WH8057> for the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820>.
Rejoice <WH8055> <WH8798> in the YY <WH3068>, ye righteous <WH6662>; and give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> at the remembrance <WH2143> of his holiness <WH6944>.
